archimate:DataObject.name: PhysicalResourceRole
archimate:DataObject.documentation: This is representing the different types of roles that various physical resources can take on. Two specialized roles have been defined: holder and adapter. This enables a single object; such as a Card; to have additional functions. For example; a Card may also serve as a motherboard or hosting board for another Card. In this situation; there isnâ€™t a separate EquipmentHolder â€“ rather; the Card acts as a holder in addition to providing its normal functions.
